author: dcspark
title: Gaming dApp Hackathon
description: Many Ethereum developers do not know they can deploy their contract on Cardano through Milkomeda
solution: We will host a virtual hackathon for individuals & companies in the blockchain games domain and share our knowledge about Cardano & Ethereum
experience: Our team is composed of well known ex-Emurgo and ex-IOHK employees who have been building the Cardano ecosystem for the past several years
